item.description:
NOTE: This is NOT the event we actively participate in each year, that is Eastern Mass PPD. However, many of our friends participate in this one and we want to show our support! As this is a field trip, anyone who wants to carpool should ask.) - Leoric

New Hampshire Pagan Pride is a non-profit organization. NH Pagan Pride Day is an annual event, held on the second Saturday of September. The purpose of this event is multi-fold. It is a day for the NH Pagan community to gather and celebrate our common bond. With many things to do such as public ritual, workshops, drumming circles, vendors, and activities for adults and children alike; this is sure to be an exciting day for all!

Please visit http://snhpaganpride.org/nh-pagan-pride-day/ for more details.
item.name: Southern NH Pagan Pride Day
